caption.p:
Principal component analysis of antibacterial and cytotoxic activities of phytochemicals, their synthetic analogues, and antibiotics against intestinal bacteria and cells in vitro. BR: berberine, SG: sanguinarine, 8HQ: 8-hydroxyquinoline, CLX: chloroxine, NXL: nitroxoline, FRN: ferron, ZP: zinc pyrithione, SA: salicylic acid, BS: bismuth subsalicylate, TA: tannic acid, CF: ceftriaxone, CP: ciprofloxacin, MA: metronidazole, VM: vancomycin, CA: chloramphenicol, TC: tetracycline. Antibiotics [ -------, ●]; Phenolic compounds [
